QuestData.Title: On the Brink
QuestData.Description: I've already been working on something for breaking down their protective wards. With a focus based in their power and a bit of druidic magic, we should be able to breach their shields.$B$BFind their shaman to the east and southeast and recover several of their amulets. I will prepare them and imbue an arrow that you can deliver to Sandrya Moonfall for the attack.
QuestData.RewardText: These will do perfectly. I will prepare them for Sandrya - you are sure to be dispatched to meet with her shortly.
